name: Slip Stream '93 Rev-LIMIT
overview: Slip Stream '93 Rev-LIMIT is an enhanced version of Slip Stream '93. It is a flat-shaded 3D racing game played from a first-person, behind view, or top-down perspective. There are fifteen different tracks and eight types of cars to choose from. You can choose to play either a Championship Race, Single Race, or VS. Battle (direct serial/null modem or telephone modem connection required). For controlling the game, a keyboard, digital/analog joystick, mouse, or Radicon Propo are supported.
